attributes.action: Compel single-sex education and training centres that receive public funds to go co-ed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At at time when secondary education has been reorganised to remove the competitive environment in which boys thrive and women now dominate university admissions, many UK towns and cities still suffer Women's Resources Centres, sinister separatist institutions that systematically bar men from their premises, and from generic adult education as well as vocational courses (the latter is permitted under current laws).
